attributes.action: Allow fully vaccinated non-UK residents to travel to the UK from 19 July 2021.
attributes.additional_details: Recognise EU and other digital Covid vaccination certificates as equal to NHS certification, and admit travellers proving fully vaccinated status.
attributes.background: Allow non-UK residents who have the proof that they have been fully vaccinated with a UK recognised anti-Covid vaccine to travel to the UK under the same arrangements as returning UK residents from 19 July 2021.
